title: The Talk Show: ‘Soviet Toilet Paper’
content:
The Talk Show

‘Soviet Toilet Paper’, With John Moltz

Sunday, 31 January 2021

John Moltz returns to the show to give stock market investment advice.

Download MP3.

  • Techmeme Ride Home: The one podcast anyone who’s anyone in Silicon Valley listens to every single day. Subscribe in your favorite podcast app, including Overcast.

  • Mack Weldon: Reinventing men’s basics with smart design, premium fabrics, and simple shopping. Get 20% off your first order with code talkshow.

Links:

  • Ming-Chi Kuo and Mark Gurman reports on 2021 Macs.
  • Mimeographs.
